channel.title: HELP WITH 508 !-now-!
channel.description:
Hey, well for starters, these are what I have done.
1.) Downloaded cache508 + titana cache. 2.) Placed them correctly, and I've double-checked them, they are right. 3.) Downloaded my 508 HD IP Changer Client. 4.) Ran an HD Server, which is Rune~Realms v2. 5.) Double-Clicked RUN and it said the Server is started on port:43594 6.) Double-Clicked the RUN in client folder, then I set the IP to 127.0.0.1 and i also tried 0.0.0.0 7.) Updates........ and it doesn't even get to 80%, it never even starts and I get this horrible message AGAIN! 8.) error_game_js5io 9.) I also checked the Client Files, and by default, it's at 127.0.0.1 like normal.
What do I do??
This was a copy paste from Run3serv3rWPS i read it and its the same problem i have, somone answer this!!!! >.<

item.title: HELP WITH 508 !-now-!
item.dc:creator: @mudderz mudderz
item.description:
@mudderz wrote:

i have an ip chnager i have hd client and source
i have all the connection things and the cache in right place nuthing works so ima just give up THANKS.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP WITH 508 !-now-!
item.dc:creator: @wanabeagle wanabeagle
item.description:
@wanabeagle wrote:

Make sure your client AND server are BOTH 508

and

Make sure that your client is connecting to the same port the server is opening. (Default 43594)

If those are both correct… Your server should be running fine… I can’t help you with anymore then that. Also, I don’t recommend IP changer clients. The few I’ve used were unstable.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP WITH 508 !-now-!
item.dc:creator: @mudderz mudderz
item.description:
@mudderz wrote:

well 508 im useing vividscape atm but ive tried david scape and a few others got the same error

Read full topic

item.title: HELP WITH 508 !-now-!
item.dc:creator: @wanabeagle wanabeagle
item.description:
@wanabeagle wrote:

I had this problem…

My suggestion: (Based on my experience)

  1. Download a new client (a different one)
  2. Run your server
  3. Use the IP address 127.0.0.1

If it still doesn’t work… Post here again and let me know what happens.

Also:
What OS are you using?
What source are you using?
What type of server are you running? 508, 317, or 525?

-Wanabeagle

Read full topic

item.title: HELP WITH 508 !-now-!

item.description:
@mudderz wrote:

Hey, well for starters, these are what I have done.

1.) Downloaded cache508 + titana cache.
2.) Placed them correctly, and I’ve double-checked them, they are right.
3.) Downloaded my 508 HD IP Changer Client.
4.) Ran an HD Server, which is Rune~Realms v2.
5.) Double-Clicked RUN and it said the Server is started on port:43594
6.) Double-Clicked the RUN in client folder, then I set the IP to 127.0.0.1 and i also tried 0.0.0.0
7.) Updates… and it doesn’t even get to 80%, it never even starts and I get this horrible message AGAIN!
8.) error_game_js5io
9.) I also checked the Client Files, and by default, it’s at 127.0.0.1 like normal.
